page.title: 02Road improvements
page.content: The tourist resort and conference centre of Torbay produces a heavy inflow and outflow of traffic into south west ENGLAND,especially in the summer months.Most of this traffic uses the A380 trunk road that bisects this block.Although sections of this road are dual carriageway,there has been a dangerous section near Ideford for many years.At present work is underway to improve more of the road tofull dual carriageway standard,thus completing dual-carriageway road from the end of the M5 motorway at Kennford to the end of the Newton Abbot bypass at Milber.
